mapper.insert: insert into ups(ups_id, LINK_ID, model_nm, instl_lc, instl_de) values(#{ups_id}, #{link_id}, #{model_nm}, #{instl_lc}, #{instl_de})
mapper.update: update ups set instl_lc = #{instl_lc}, instl_de = #{instl_de} where ups_id = #{ups_id} and LINK_ID = #{link_id}
mapper.delete: delete from ups where ups_id = #{ups_id} and LINK_ID = #{link_id}
